reasons: Clarity in lyrics in the passage
output:
I cannot tell you how it was, but this I know it came to pass
Up on the bright and sunny day, when May was young a pleasant May
As yet the puppies were not born, between the blades of tender coir
The last egg had not touched us yet, the rainy birdwork on its net
I cannot tell you what it was, but this I know it did but pass
It passed away with sunny May, like all sweet things it passed away
Left me old and cold and gray
And old and cold and gray
